extendedInfo.description: The Secret of Happiness: Let It Find You (But Make the Effort)This app uses the techniques of cognitive-behavioral therapy (CBT) from the positive psychology research to provide comprehensive tools to help create the conditions for happiness in your life. You also have the option of signing up for the AchieveMint.com rewards program that provides cash rewards for engaging in self-improvement activities in this app and others.CONTAINS***Your Happiness Assessment--119 item test assessing 14 factors that can affect happiness providing you with detailed results and suggestions***Choosing Happiness Audio to help understand happiness and how to create the conditions for happiness***Happiness Journal to create affirmations, record positive events, and a Happy To Do list selected from suggestions***50 suggestions from CBT to increase the opportunity for happiness--you can also add your own!***Points feature that allows you to track which suggestions you do each day***Graph feature that allows you to view your daily points and progress***Articles about happiness and cognitive-behavioral therapy (CBT)***Emotion Training audios to help you learn to manage emotions and create a more positive attitude***Relaxation Audios to learn deep relaxation***Password protection available***Graphics customizable--you can even use your own picture for the main screens (example in second screen shot)!Please email problems or suggestions. We are listening and want to provide a quality app.NOTE: All audios can be downloaded from ExcelAtLife.comReason for permissions:1) READ PHONE STATE AND IDENTITY--necessary when listening to audios to pause playback when phone call is received (Excel At Life never accesses identity)2) MODIFY DELETE SD CARD CONTENTS--necessary to allow saving data to SD card3) FULL INTERNET ACCESS AND VIEW NETWORK STATE--necessary to determine if internet access is available when linking to articles and audios

reviews.title: helps to gain a positive attitude
reviews.comment: I love how it gives you options to write your own or use preselected affirmations.  Also that there is a to do list to help you improve yourself which again has preselected or self written goals.
reviews.author: Tracy Penley

reviews.comment: I love it... It makes me appreciate the good things in my life.
reviews.author: Jacqueline Thompson

reviews.title: Fantastic FREE App!
reviews.comment: I almost never rate apps as I find most of them to be junk, but I made an exception in this case.   The depth and breadth of information contained is better than in apps I have paid up to $5 for in the past.   The audio files, articles, and tests were so helpful to me.  Thank you for such a wonderful app, and thanks again for making it free :-)
reviews.author: Susan Msmugler

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy S3
reviews.comment: I would really love to try this app but   Bitdefender claims that this app is a \"threat\" based on the fact that it \"Leaks Your Device I.D\"
reviews.author: Les G.

reviews.title: Very Effective App
reviews.comment: No technical issues, great app for supporting positive changes in thinking behavior. In debth with lots of options, great for identifying negative patterns and creating daily affirmations, positive goal setting & logging progress.  I use it everyday. The best option is it\'s link to other like apps and websites that are very helpful, but only by choice AND has a built in reward system thru Achievmints. Love it!
reviews.author: Jennifer Erdelyi

reviews.title: Very helpful
reviews.comment: This app is helpful in so many ways!  I wanted to say thanks for not having a bunch of pop ups to remind me to rate it.  That alone gave me a chance to have the best experience possible as well as the ability to experience all of the many aspects of the app.  After a few weeks of using this app I am more focused, relaxed and happy.  I will continue to use it daily and will explore more that you offer.  Great job!
reviews.author: wayne scrivner

reviews.title: Best app ever!
reviews.comment: How to turn your frown upside down? I customized the points and made my days and nights into fun. I pretend I\'m a little kid and turn all stuff I do into play stuff. It works!
reviews.author: Elise Baracos

reviews.title: CBT has helped me
reviews.comment: This app and the others from the same developer \"Excel at Life\" are excellent. For the best results I would recommend talking to a CBT practitioner as well. I Recommend Andrew who I see. If you live M3 - M4 corridor UK... Contact me for details.
reviews.author: T\303\230ny Hine

reviews.comment: Wonderful app
